net.proteusframework.internet.http

Interface Site


  • public interface Site
    Represents an internet site.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<Locale> getAdditionalLocales()
      Get the additional locales supported by the site.
      Hostname getDefaultHostname()
      Get the default hostname for the site.
      Hostname getDefaultSSLHostname()
      Get the default SSL hostname for the site.
      TimeZone getDefaultTimeZone()
      Get the default time zone of the site.
      net.proteusframework.users.model.AuthenticationDomain getDomain()
      Get the authentication domain for this site.
      long getId()
      Get a unique identifier for the site.
      Date getLastModified()
      Get the last modified time.
      Locale getPrimaryLocale()
      Get the primary locale for the site.
      boolean isPrimaryLocaleFallback()
      Test if the primary locale fallback is enabled.

    • Method Detail

      • getAdditionalLocales

        Set<Locale> getAdditionalLocales()
        Get the additional locales supported by the site.
        Returns:
        the additional locales.

      • getDefaultHostname

        Hostname getDefaultHostname()
        Get the default hostname for the site.
        Returns:
        the hostname.

      • getDefaultSSLHostname

        Hostname getDefaultSSLHostname()
        Get the default SSL hostname for the site.
        Returns:
        the hostname.

      • getDefaultTimeZone

        TimeZone getDefaultTimeZone()
        Get the default time zone of the site.
        Returns:
        the default timezone or null.

      • getDomain

        net.proteusframework.users.model.AuthenticationDomain getDomain()
        Get the authentication domain for this site.
        Returns:
        the domain. May be null.

      • getId

        long getId()
        Get a unique identifier for the site.
        Returns:
        the site identifier.

      • getLastModified

        Date getLastModified()
        Get the last modified time.
        Returns:
        the last modified time.

      • getPrimaryLocale

        Locale getPrimaryLocale()
        Get the primary locale for the site.
        Returns:
        the locale.

      • isPrimaryLocaleFallback

        boolean isPrimaryLocaleFallback()
        Test if the primary locale fallback is enabled.
        Returns:
        true or false. If true, the primary locale should be treated as a fallback locale when rendering content.
